Syndra.name: Syndraº
Syndra.title: ºøthe Dark Sovereignøº
Syndra.lore:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøBorn with immense magical potential, Syndra loves nothing more than exercising the incredible power at her command. With each passing day, her mastery of magical force grows more potent and devastating. Refusing any notion of balance or restraint, Syndra wants only to retain control of her power, even if it means annihilating the authorities that seek to stop her.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºThroughout her youth in Ionia, Syndra's reckless use of magic terrified the elders of her village. They took her to a remote temple, leaving her in the care of an old mage. To Syndra's delight, the mage explained that the temple was a school - a place where she could develop her talents under his guidance. Though she learned much during her time there, Syndra no longer felt her power growing as it had in her youth. Her frustration grew, and she finally confronted her mentor, demanding an explanation. He revealed that he had dampened Syndra's magic, hoping to help her learn control and restraint. Accusing him of betrayal, she advanced on the mage, commanding him to lift the spell that was holding her back. He backed away, telling her that if she couldn't control herself, he would be forced to nullify Syndra's magic completely. Furious, she summoned her power and dashed the old man against the walls. With her mentor dead, Syndra felt the rush of her unbounded potential for the first time in years. Though she had won her freedom, she refused to return to the society that had tried to steal her gift. Instead, Syndra decided to claim her former prison as a stronghold. Pushing the boundaries of her magic, she tore the structure from its foundations and raised it into the sky. Free to delve further into her art, Syndra now aims to grow powerful enough to destroy the weak, foolish leaders of Ionia - and anyone else who would dare to shackle her greatness.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºø''Power belongs to those who can wield it.''ºøºøº
º-- Syndraº
Syndra.blurb: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøBorn with immense magical potential, Syndra loves nothing more than exercising the incredible power at her command. With each passing day, her mastery of magical force grows more potent and devastating. Refusing any ...
allytips: ºøºøºøºøºTo maximize your ultimate's damage use it when there are many spheres on the battlefield.ºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºAfter you hit an enemy champion with Force of Will follow up with Dark Sphere, they'll be slowed and have a hard time avoiding it.ºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøGet one of your spells to rank 5 as quickly as possible, they gain powerful bonus effects at max rank.øºøºøºøºøº
enemytips: ºøºøºøºøGet boots early when playing against Syndra, they'll help you avoid many of her spells.ºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøAttack Syndra after she's used Scatter the Weak, it has a long cooldown so she'll be vulnerable.ºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºAt max rank Syndra's spells gain bonus effects and change in appearance.ºøºøºøº

spells.name: ºDark Sphereº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøSyndra conjures a Dark Sphere dealing magic damage. The sphere remains and can be manipulated by her other powers.ºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip: ºøºConjures a Dark Sphere dealing ºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøºø magic damage. The sphere remains for øºøº{{ e2 }}ºøºøºø seconds and can be manipulated by Syndra's other abilities.øºøºøº

spells.name: ºøForce of Willº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøSyndra picks up and throws a Dark Sphere or enemy minion dealing magic damage and slowing the movement speed of enemies. øºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºFirst Cast:ººøºøºøºøºø Grabs target Dark Sphere or enemy minion. If no target is selected, grabs nearest Dark Sphere.ºøºøºøºøº

ºSecond Cast:ººøºøºø Throws the Dark Sphere or enemy minion. Enemies hit take øºøºøº{{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøº magic damage and are slowed by ºøº{{ e1 }}% for º{{ f2 }}º seconds.º

spells.name: ºøScatter the Weakº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºSyndra knocks enemies and Dark Spheres back dealing magic damage. Enemies hit by Dark Spheres become stunned.ºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºøºøKnocks enemies and Dark Spheres back dealing ºøºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøºøºø magic damage to them and any enemies they collide with.ºøºøº

ºøºøºøºDark Spheres that are knocked back stun all enemies in their path for ºøºøºøº{{ e2 }}º seconds.º

spells.name: ºøUnleashed Powerº
spells.description: ºøºøºøSyndra bombards an enemy Champion with all of her Dark Spheres.ºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip: ºøºøºøºøDraws upon Syndra's full cataclysmic power, harnessing all Dark Spheres to deal øºøºøºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøºø magic damage per sphere (Minimum damage øºøº{{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }})ºø) to an enemy Champion.ºøº

passive.name: ºTranscendentº
passive.description:
ºøºøSpells gain extra effects at max rank.øºøº

ºDark Sphereººøºø: Deals 15% bonus damage to champions.øºøº
ºøForce of Willººøºø: Increases the slowing duration by 33%.øºøº
ºøScatter the Weakººøº: Spell width increased by 50%.ºøº
ºøUnleashed Powerººø: Range increased by 75.ºøº
